title: 2 Quick Ways to Log Out of Google Drive on Windows or Mac

steps.title: Launch the Google Drive application.
steps.content: Launch the Google Drive application. This looks like a multi-colored triangle. If Google Drive is already running in the background, skip this step. Google Drive is available to download on Windows and Mac.

steps.title: Click the Google Drive icon.
steps.content: Click the Google Drive icon. As Google Drive automatically syncs your files, you can find the icon active in your taskbar. A pop-up menu will open. On Windows, find the icon at the bottom-right corner in your system tray. If you don't see the icon, click the arrow to expand your tray. On Mac, the icon will be at the top-right corner of your menu bar.

steps.title: Click the cog icon.
steps.content: Click the cog icon. You can find this at the top-right corner of the pop-up menu. A drop-down menu will appear. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Click Preferences.
steps.content: Click Preferences . This is the first option in the menu. A new window will open.

steps.title: Click the cog icon.
steps.content: Click the cog icon. This will be to the left of your Google account's icon.

steps.title: Click Disconnect account.
steps.content: Click Disconnect account . You can find this at the top-right corner of the page. It will be in blue. When you disconnect your account, any files streaming from Google Drive will no longer be available on your device.

steps.title: Click Disconnect.
steps.content: Click Disconnect . This is the blue button. You will be logged out of Google Drive. If you want to sign in again or sign into another account, click Sign in with browser to proceed. If you want to remove the Google Drive application, you'll need to uninstall the program using Apps & features (Windows) or the Applications folder (Mac). [2] X Trustworthy Source Microsoft Support Technical support and product information from Microsoft. Go to source

steps.title: Go to https://drive.google.com in a web browser.
steps.content: Go to https://drive.google.com in a web browser. If you're signed into your Google account , you should see your Google Drive home page. [3] X Research source Use this method to sign out of the Google Drive website. This method will not sign you out of the Google Drive desktop app.

steps.title: Click your profile picture.
steps.content: Click your profile picture. This will be in the top-right corner of the window. [4] X Research source A drop-down menu will open.

steps.title: Click Sign out.
steps.content: Click Sign out . If you're logged into multiple accounts, you'll see Sign out of all accounts . [5] X Research source You will be signed out of Google Drive. If you want to access your files again, log in with your email address and password.
